summary: Texture replacer for Barenziahs crime of a jewel..
descriptionHtml:
A (rather futile) attempt to replace the hideous Barenziahs jewel..


 Pack contains textures , glow map and normal map all in 1024 x1024 resolution...

If you were looking for the chest and not the stone...try  [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5261]Barenziahs Crappy Box[/url] which comes with its own jewel texture


*****************************************************************************
Using the Nexus Mod Manager is highly recommended.
*****************************************************************************

Manual Install:
Extract the archive in your Skyrim Installation folder

Manual Uninstall:
Delete barenziahscrown, barenziahscrown_g and barenziahscrown_n.dds from Data\\textures\\clutter\\quest

*****************************************************************************
Redistribution with or without further editing is prohibited without my prior consent.
*****************************************************************************
